医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
AI 从咳嗽中检测出 COVID-19 的能力面临着现实世界的挑战Nature Machine Intelligence 的一项研究表明，虽然 AI 分类器可以从录音中预测 COVID-19，但在考虑到混杂因素时，其有效性会降低，这突显了在现实环境中应用 AI 诊断的挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/AIs-ability-to-detect-COVID-19-from-coughs-faces-real-world-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/AIs-ability-to-detect-COVID-19-from-coughs-faces-real-world-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ad75579-731a-4075-a06b-2791faa250a8 Thu, 08 Feb 2024 21:05:00 -0500 AI's ability to detect COVID-19 from coughs faces real-world challenges
CDC发现人工泪液与耐药细菌爆发有关疾病预防控制中心的科学家将多州爆发的高度耐药性铜绿假单胞菌追溯到特定品牌的非处方人工泪液，这强调了对医疗产品进行更严格监管的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Artificial-tears-linked-to-drug-抵抗-bacteria-outbreak-CDC-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Artificial-tears-linked-to-drug-抵抗-bacteria-outbreak-CDC-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=334ebaa8-0b7e-4b8e-b4bc-222ff57dc7a2 Thu, 08 Feb 2024 20:43:00 -0500 Artificial tears linked to drug-resistant bacteria outbreak, CDC finds
研究发现，膳食烟酸摄入量越高，慢性阻塞性肺病风险越低《科学报告》最近的研究揭示了膳食烟酸摄入量与慢性阻塞性肺病 (COPD) 患病率降低之间的剂量反应关系，表明烟酸在减轻 COPD 患者氧化应激和炎症方面具有潜在作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Higher-dietary-niacin-intake-linked-to-lower-COPD-risk-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Higher-dietary-niacin-intake-linked-to-lower-COPD-risk-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75514446-3e33-4c8f-bb3d-94b4fcb8ccb0 Thu, 08 Feb 2024 19:15:00 -0500 Higher dietary niacin intake linked to lower COPD risk, study finds
纳米纤维涂层棉绷带可抵抗感染并帮助伤口更快愈合康奈尔大学的研究人员发现了一种新方法，可以利用植物化合物的抗氧化和抗菌特性来制造纳米纤维涂层棉绷带，以抵抗感染并帮助伤口更快愈合。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Nanofibre-coated-cotton-bandages-fight-infection-and-help-wounds-to-heal-more-quickly.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Nanofibre-coated-cotton-bandages-fight-infection-and-help-wounds-to-heal-more-quickly.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=52067812-4c8e-4206-ba77-4c5facc8f400 Thu, 08 Feb 2024 14:39:28 -0500 Nanofiber-coated cotton bandages fight infection and help wounds to heal more quickly
免疫细胞超速运转：研究发现不平衡的反应会加剧肺部感染CD4+ T 细胞因其在肺部感染免疫反应中发挥的重要作用而在科学文献中得到强调。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Immune-cells-in-overdrive-Study-finds-unbalanced-response-worsens-lung-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Immune-cells-in-overdrive-Study-finds-unbalanced-response-worsens-lung-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a33d703b-ea84-4265-8936-f544243efdee Thu, 08 Feb 2024 14:32:56 -0500 Immune cells in overdrive: Study finds unbalanced response worsens lung infections
研究表明早产儿和足月儿之间的大脑连接模式不同伦敦国王学院对 390 名婴儿进行的一项新扫描研究显示，足月婴儿和早产婴儿在大脑网络的即时活动和连接方面存在不同的模式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Study-shows-distinct-patterns-of-brain-connectivity- Between-pre-term-and-term-babies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Study-shows-distinct-patterns-of-brain-connectivity- Between-pre-term-and-term-babies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1e96b48-8f33-42a3-abb2-cf9de6de08b0 Thu, 08 Feb 2024 14:20:58 -0500 Study shows distinct patterns of brain connectivity between pre-term and term babies
线粒体失火引发炎症人体内的细胞含有发电线粒体，每个线粒体都有自己的线粒体DNA——一组独特的遗传指令，完全独立于细胞核DNA，线粒体利用线粒体来产生赋予生命的能量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Mitochondria-misfire-sparks-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Mitochondria-misfire-sparks-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed4a35b4-3229-4ed1-802d-e20312cc2043 Thu, 08 Feb 2024 14:12:40 -0500 Mitochondrial misfire sparks inflammation
新药针对 ALS 关键机制，保护运动神经元一种新的药物抑制剂可以干预导致运动神经元死亡的中枢细胞死亡机制，因此对运动神经元疾病肌萎缩侧索硬化症（ALS）的进展很重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/New-drug-targets-key-mechanism-in-ALS-protects-motor-neurons.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/New-drug-targets-key-mechanism-in-ALS-protects-motor-neurons.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d3e998e-9d20-4ba8-9384-be2fdd355ec7 Thu, 08 Feb 2024 14:01:47 -0500 New drug targets key mechanism in ALS, protects motor neurons
靶向基因-成纤维细胞相互作用为治疗耐药性结肠癌带来希望一篇新的研究论文发表在 Aging（被 MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”和 Web of Science 的“Aging-US”）第 16 卷第 2 期，题为“PROX1 与 α-SMA-rich 的相互作用”癌症相关成纤维细胞会促进结直肠癌的进展，并与不良的临床结果和治疗耐药性相关。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Targeting-gene-fabricblast-interaction-offers-hope-for-treatment-pressive-colon-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Targeting-gene-fabricblast-interaction-offers-hope-for-treatment-pressive-colon-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0bf60e5d-35cf-4eda-9f5e-183b9b8329e4 Thu, 08 Feb 2024 13:47:28 -0500 Targeting gene-fibroblast interaction offers hope for treatment-resistant colon cancer
复发性骨髓瘤的希望：鲁索替尼疗效的临床前和临床证据2024 年 2 月 5 日，Oncotarget 第 15 卷发表了一项新的研究观点，题为“Janus 激酶抑制剂 ruxolitinib 在多发性骨髓瘤中的临床前和临床评估”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Hope-for-relapsed-myeloma-Preclinical-and-clinical-evidence-for-ruxolitinibs-efficacy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Hope-for-relapsed-myeloma-Preclinical-and-clinical-evidence-for-ruxolitinibs-efficacy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a83406a-7bef-46dc-a584-b792a36d00f7 Thu, 08 Feb 2024 13:32:26 -0500 Hope for relapsed myeloma: Preclinical and clinical evidence for ruxolitinib's efficacy
